articles.title: Cynthia Koh lands on Greek TV news for 'milk-your-curves' dress - AsiaOne
articles.description: Local actress Cynthia Koh has appeared on Greek TV news for her controversial 'milk-your-curves’ dress that she recently wore to the Asian Academy Creative Awards. Yesterday (Dec 8), the 47-year-old expressed her joy and shock on a series of Instagram Stories…
articles.content:
Local actress Cynthia Koh has appeared on Greek TV news for her controversial 'milk-your-curves dress that she recently wore to the Asian Academy Creative Awards.

articles.title: Singapore boasts 6 spots on World's 50 Best Bars 2021 list - CNA
articles.description: London's Connaught Bar is the world's best, while Jigger & Pony is Singapore's only entry in the Top 10 at No 9. Atlas lost its The Best Bar in Asia title, which it had held for two years.
articles.content:
Nightlife in Singapore may have quieted down during the pandemic but that hasnt stopped some of our local drinking establishments from topping the Worlds 50 Best Bars 2021 list.
